snippet: Two women who were visiting inmates at the Rikers Island corrections complex on a Sunday in October had property stolen from their cars.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column observes irony that thieves hit visitors' cars parked in a lot at the Rikers Island corrections complex; says fact that the lot is part of a prison complex, filled with surveillance cameras, would deter most potential thieves.
lead_paragraph: Two women who were visiting inmates at the Rikers Island corrections complex on a Sunday in October had property stolen from their cars.

headline.seo: Unlikely Spot for a Break-In: The Rikers Parking Lot
headline.main: Some Thieves at City’s Jails Lurk Outside
headline.print_headline: Some Thieves At City’s Jails Lurk Outside
